name: MEDIEVAL MARKET (VR)
description: This project will propose to implement VR technology on the theme of the medieval marketplace, so that people can review and understand the environment and operation of the medieval market and the relevant historical and cultural aspects. The proposed project focuses not only on medieval architecture and character building in VR environments, but also on the interaction between users and the VR environment. Different centuries and different countries will have different historical heritages and environments. And the historical legacy of medieval themes has received little attention. The public's impression of the Middle Ages only stays on architecture and clothing, but in fact, the medieval market contains rich culture of the times, which is very worth experiencing and learning.
